title: Identifying the y-intercept.
text: The y-intercept is the value of the output when the value of the input is $$0$$. Using the equation we derived in part a, when $$x=0$$, $$C=25000$$.
speech: The y-intercept is the value of the output when the value of the input is  0 . Using the equation we derived in part a, when  x, is equal to, 0 ,    c, is equal to 25000 .
